Title: An Act Converting Certain Provincial Roads in the Province of Antique into National Roads
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 320
An Act Converting Certain Provincial Roads in the Province of Antique into National Roads
Section 1. The following provincial roads in the Province of Antique are converted into and declared as national roads:

(a) Anini-y-Tobias Fornier Hamtic Road
(b) Bugasong Walderama Road
(c) Bagumbayan-Pandan-Libertad to Aklan-Antique Boundary
(d) Sibalom Egrana-Bia-an Hamtic Road.

Section 2. Any provision of law, decree, order, rule or regulation inconsistent with this Act is repealed or modified accordingly.1Ã¢wphi1
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: November 14, 1982
